title: Priced at under $40, PDF Reader Pro makes a great stocking stuffer
content:
Macworld

Christmas is less than ten days away, which means it’s too late to guarantee that your gifts will be shipped and arrive on time. That being the case, you might opt for a digital gift instead, such as PDF Reader Pro. Perfect for students and professionals alike, this Mac- and Windows-compatible PDF-editing powerhouse is on sale for only $39.99 (reg. $59).

PDF Reader Pro (4.6-star rated with installation on over 60 million devices worldwide) is an all-in-one tool that allows users to make working with PDFs more seamless. This tool enables users to edit text and images on PDFs, organize PDF pages, enjoy batch PDF converting, transform PDF files into Word, Excel, etc., and much more.

Users can also enjoy security features with PDF Reader Pro, as they can encrypt PDFs with passwords to protect sensitive information, and other annotation features, like marking up PDFs with extensive tools. Additionally, you can create PDFs with fillable forms, which may be especially helpful for professionals.

Treat someone special to a gift that promotes productivity and functionality for life.

Get PDF Reader Pro for Mac or Windows for just $39.99. No coupon required!
